grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 欺詐【ギサ】fraud, fraudulence, dupery, hoax
ナイジェリア詐欺【ナイジェリアサギ】Nigerian fraud, 419 fraud
架空請求詐欺【カクウセイキュウサギ】fraud based on demanding payment for false claims or non-existent bills
kun reading compounds: 欺く【あざむく】to deceive, to delude, to trick, to fool, to be as ... as ... (e.g. "as bright as day", "as beautiful as a rose")
